content.rendered:
The information we collect

We use cookies on our website, to collect information about your use. You can allow or disallow cookies on your computer, by updating your cookie preferences, this can be done through your web browser’s preferences/options/tools.

The table below outlines the cookies that are collected on our website.

[cookies]

Why we collect this information

We collect information relating to the activity on each page of our website so that we can measure and improve the performance of the website and understand how visitors are arriving at our website.
Read our Privacy Policy
